card_text: "Plunder Patroll" monsters you control gain 500 ATK for each "Plunder Patroll" card in your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use each of the following effects of "Plunder Patroll Shipyarrrd" once per turn.$N●You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Plunder Patroll" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Plunder Patroll Shipyarrrd".$N●If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Plunder Patroll" card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Set this card, and if you do, return that target to the hand.
